import AppSidebar from "../../../Components/Sidebars/AppSidebar"; import AppTopbar from "../../../Components/Topbars/AppTopbar" import CampaignSidebar from "../../../Components/Sidebars/CampaignSidebar" import SingleCampaignNavbar from "../../../Components/CampaignComponents/SingleCampaignNavbar"; import CampaignAdd from "../../../Components/CampaignComponents/CampaignProspects/CampaignAdd" import {GlobalContext} from "../../../GlobalProvider" import { useContext } from "react"; function SingleCampaignSettings() { const {addProspectCampaign} = useContext(GlobalContext) const [campaignProspectAdd] = addProspectCampaign return(
{campaignProspectAdd===true ? : null}

Stop Campaign On Reply

Stop follow up emails when a Prospect replies.

) } export default SingleCampaignSettings;
